author: drumforgod82
body:
I am unable to install PowerShell 7 Preview at work.  The Microsoft Store and Github are both blocked.  I had to use my personal computer to get into Github, so I can relay this message.

I have even tried the following link: https://mikefrobbins.com/2019/07/11/install-powershell-7-with-jeff-hicks-psreleasetools-module/.  Still got errors and would not copy it.

Please work on another option to install PowerShell 7 (especially when it is fully released), for businesses that have the Microsoft Store and GitHub blocked.

comments.author: SteveL-MSFT
comments.body: @drumforgod82 You can access PowerShellGallery.com and Azure.com?

comments.author: msftrncs
comments.body: @drumforgod82, communication with your IT team would be incredibly valuable.  They may not understand your needs.  If they intend to block you from such resources, it will not matter where PowerShell is released, it will be blocked.

comments.author: drumforgod82
comments.body: @SteveL-MSFT, I can get to both the PowerShellGallery.com and Azure.com.

title: Unable to install PowerShell 7 Preview at work
